name: Novicons Jump
description:
A very fun game, for all ages. Easy to play, with simple mechanics.

How high can you get?
Climb your way to the top, jumping on to different types of platforms, collect coins and unlock new game characters!

Control one of the most powerful races of the galaxy, the NOVICONS!
Use these powerful bouncy creatures and help them rescue their friends by collecting coins and unlocking them in the game

Be aware of the ELEMENTICONS!
Those creatures are nothing like the novicons, they seek to destroy novicons and rule the galaxy, don't pity them!

Use the power of friendship, the power of GUARDIMONS!
They are powerful, fearless and loyal to their friends, novicons. Guardimons is another race of creatures that were welcomed by novicons when they needed their help. Guardimons now help Novicons eliminate Elementicons and bring peace back to the galaxy...

Choose from a variety of Novicons and Guardimons you would like to play with, with more to come in the next updates!
